item.title: How to host Hugo website on Github Pages
item.author: connectwthmusa@gmail.com (Musa Ahmed)
item.description: This is not finished How to host Hugo site on Github Pre-requisites Github Account Git (terminal utility) How to change Directories in the terminal Make a repo with the following name [username].github.io Please note that [username] indicates your own personal username. Get your Hugo files in order and place it in a folder designated for this project Make all neccesary changes you need to make to your content, config etc.
item.dc:creator: Musa Ahmed

item.title: Begginers introduciton to installing and understanding Linux.
item.author: connectwthmusa@gmail.com (Musa Ahmed)
item.description: Guide to Installing Linux (for beginners) Introduction Hello, this guide is for Linux beginners who are looking to try Linux out don’t know where to start. Below is a table of contents that outlines all the things we will be covering in this guide. So what is Linux anyways? Linux is a family of open-source Unix-like operating systems based on the Linux kernel, an operating system kernel first released on September 17, 1991, by Linus Torvalds.
item.dc:creator: Musa Ahmed
